description: This file defines a custom exception class 'SimpleBankingGlobalException' used for global error handling in the banking application. It extends RuntimeException and includes fields for error code and message, with proper Lombok annotations for boilerplate code reduction.

classes.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception class for global error handling in the application, supporting error code and message fields.

methods.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a message.
